Uses of Package
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character

Packages that use it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model

it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.advanced

it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board
 
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character used by it.polimi.ingsw.game_model
    Class
    Description
    Assistant
    Assistant models the concept of "assistant card" in the game, it is the card you play at the beginning of your turn, its main attributes are cost and possible steps, in fact when you play an assistant its cost determines players turn's order, and possible steps determines the max number of steps you can move Mother nature on the islands.
    BagOfStudents
    A class representing the bag of the game.
    DeckAssistants
    Class to manage assistant distribution to players: each player has the same number of assistants, one for each type, so there are 4 groups of assistants, one for each player's deck.
    MotherNature
    MotherNature models the Mother nature piece in the game: its function is to determine the island where influence is calculated
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character used by it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character

    Character
    The class king.
